statements: DELETE FROM peak_usage_hours_analysis WHERE user_id = 1 AND activity_timestamp < '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM peak_usage_hours_analysis WHERE activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-10-31' AND user_id IN (2, 3);
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1 AND activity_timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM peak_usage_hours WHERE total_users > 100 AND peak_hour BETWEEN '2022-01-01 08:00:00' AND '2022-01-01 20:00:00';
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 100 AND activity_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM peak_hours_activities WHERE user_id = 2 AND activity_type = 'Running';
DELETE FROM page_views WHERE user_id = 10 AND page_id = 5;
